answers.answer: Hi,Reglan provides relief from the symptoms of gastroparesis. But it does not cure the underlying cause.Confirm gastroparesis with the help of gastric emptying study.Evaluate for the underlying cause like diabetes and treat the underlying cause also for better relief.
